content: yabbis the magic toad is a character from the game moonlight peaks which will be released in 2026 this game is developed by little chicken game company little chicken game company asked me to make a pattern from this very cute character yabbis the magic toad a little story about yabbis yabbis the magical toad mysteriously appears in the forests of moonlight peaks he delights the inhabitants by offering seeds and flowery decorations known for his spontaneous haikus yabbis often recites poetry to his customers the pdf pattern is available in english dutch german and french link to free english pattern https //www mariskavos nl/free-moonlight-peaks-crochet-pattern/ link to free dutch nederlands pattern https //www mariskavos nl/nl/gratis-moonlight-peaks-haakpatroon/
